title: Textile, ca. 1963
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic and cotton
Technique: Jacquard-woven
dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 357 x 89 cm (11 ft. 8 9/16 in. x 35 1/16 in.)
Repeat H x W (two and a half units accross width): 62 x 35 cm (24 7/16 x 13 3/4 in.)
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Marion K. Morgan and from General Acquisitions Endowment, Sarah Cooper-Hewitt, and Eleanor G. Hewitt Funds
description: Large olive-green chenille flowers on cream flowers and silver leaves. Design is an off-set.
